New Records: Shohei Ohtani became the first player ever to hit 50 home runs and steal 50 bases in the same season.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani hit three home runs and had 10 RBIs in a pennant-race game.
Pre-Game Insights: There has been talk that Ohtani shouldn’t win the MVP because a designated hitter never has won it.
Post-Match Reflections: Mookie Betts could only laugh. ‘I mean... it’s just funny. It’s amazing,’ he said.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a pennant-race game with the entire baseball world focused on Ohtani's every swing.
Others: The victory clinched the Dodgers’ 12th consecutive playoff berth.
